relationships.description: Sender sharing legal information and journalist contacts
Sent information about Trump to various media outlets

analysis.purpose: To share legal information about potential criminal liability for Trump's comments about NFL players and document outreach to journalists
analysis.significance: Shows activist efforts to pursue legal action against Trump and media outreach strategy

concerns: Potential violation of 18 U.S. Code ยง 227 regarding influencing private employment decisions

notable_quotes: Trump's urging that some NFL players be fired could cost him 15 years in prison
I sent the Attn: Mueller re Trump crime to these journalists
red_flags: Potential misuse of official position for political purposes
Attempt to influence employment decisions based on political affiliation

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - this is informational sharing about legal matters

illegal_activity.description: Document shares legal analysis and news about potential illegal activity by Trump, but contains no first-hand illegal activity by the sender or recipients

details: References to sending information to AP, NY Times, LA Times, Washington Post, Village Voice, syndicated sports columnist

public_knowledge.context: Trump's comments about NFL players kneeling during national anthem were widely covered in media in 2017

analysis.summary: Paul Krassner emails Jeffrey E. with legal analysis suggesting Trump could face 15 years in prison for influencing NFL employment decisions, and documents his outreach to multiple journalists and Senator Al Franken about pursuing this legal theory.
